metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2573 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL Server 5.5.41 and earlier, and 5.6.22 and earlier, allows remote authenticated users to affect availability via vectors related to DDL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2573` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadbclient18 - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-client - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-client-5.5 - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-client-core-5.5 - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-common - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-server - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-server-5.5 - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-server-core-5.5 - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-test - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
mariadb-test-5.5 - 5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2
No subscription required

libmysqlclient18 - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
libmysqld-pic - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-5.5 - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.5 - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-common - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-5.5 - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.5 - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-source-5.5 - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.5 - 5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

mysql-client-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-common-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-source-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.6 - 5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mariadb-5.5 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.46-1ubuntu0.14.04.2').
mysql-5.5 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.43-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
mysql-5.6 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.27-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
